title: Are Men's and Women's tournaments different?
description: The goal of this notebook is to explore the data of both the Men's and Women's competitions and answering the following questions:  How did the game evolved over the years? What stats are most useful to predict the outcome of a game? What are the differences between the Men's and Women's competitions?  To do so, we need to produce some aggregated statistics. The next few hidden cells have all the functions to do just that.
